events.name: Hack Cyprus 2012
events.about:
What is Hack Cyprus 2012?

The first ever weekend-long hackathon in Cyprus.

What can you expect?

Code = Hack on your ideas for more than 30 hours using any technology you like. Meet other people and form teams. Well provide drinks, food and internet so you can focus on just building cool stuff. Well also try to organise 15-minute talks on various technologies throughout the weekend, so we can all learn while hacking as well.

Sun = If you live abroad, forget rain and clouds. We have 326 days of sunshine every year. When youre done with coding, you can hit the beach in no time. During the event, well make sure that its always cool and nice, and well provide plenty of refreshments, always, free of charge.

Prizes = Prizes for the best ideas kindly provided by our sponsors. Presentations will take place during the last hour of the event, over beers! 

Where can I get more information?

Please visit our official website http://hackcyprus.com
